ygData.subject: Tailoring
ygData.msgSnippet: Any higher level tailors out there? I am lvl 70 in tailoring, and working toward making Halfling tailored and imbued armor. I am a level 29 halfling druid,
ygData.messageBody:
Any higher level tailors out there? I am lvl 70 in tailoring, and
working toward making Halfling tailored and imbued armor. I am a
level 29 halfling druid, able so far to brew and smith the various
parts I have needed to make my reinforced leather armor. I am soon to
be off to Kunark to obtain my brute hides. Anyone been a brute
hunter, who can give me any advise?

What minimum level shall I need to succeed in brute hunting? And what
sources for the high quality ore? I am not a good dungeon fighter,
especially solo. Runnyeye is a bit much without a good group, and so
far I have not found good groups for that fun place. Any suggestions
for the getting of the required ore? Any other places it drops?

Do the metal pieces used in the halfling armor have to also be made
of hq ore, or just the sewing kit? The sites I have visited are not
all that clear on that one.

Good hunting, everyone!

Barto Proudfoot
